title: Supporting Stabilization and Human Security in Libya through Humanitarian Mine Action
description: The project aims to reduce the social, economic, and environmental impacts of mines, unexploded ordnance, and other explosive hazards in order to facilitate reconstruction and development and the safe and sustainable return of all displaced persons across Libya. The project will do do by carrying various Mine Action activities including Explosive Ordnance Disposal (EOD), Battle Area Clearance (BAC), Stockpile Destruction, Non-technical Survey and Explosive Ordnance Risk Education across Libya.
